languages.text: "Также позвольте напомнить, что мы все еще находимся в поисках Главного технопровидца. Корабль и его машинные духи отчаянно нуждаются в надзоре опытного техножреца. Нам также недостает команды. И, что важно — мы так и не нашли Хейнрикса ван Калокса, правую руку Лорд-инквизитора. Теперь мы точно знаем, что его не было на Эурак-V. Учитывайте это при составлении дальнейших планов".

traits.locale_text: "Также позвольте напомнить, что мы все еще находимся в поисках старшего Технопровидца. Корабль и его машинные духи отчаянно нуждаются в надзоре опытного техножреца. Нам также недостает команды. И, что важно — мы так и не нашли Хейнрикса ван Калокса, правую руку Лорд-инквизитора. Теперь мы точно знаем, что его не было на Эурак-V. Учитывайте это при составлении дальнейших планов".

languages.text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."
languages.original_text: "Также позвольте напомнить, что мы все еще находимся в поисках Главного технопровидца. Корабль и его машинные духи отчаянно нуждаются в надзоре опытного техножреца. Нам также недостает команды. И, что важно — мы так и не нашли Хейнрикса ван Калокса, правую руку Лорд-инквизитора. Теперь мы точно знаем, что его не было на Эурак-V. Учитывайте это при составлении дальнейших планов".

traits.locale_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for a Chief Enginseer. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of an oversight by an experienced tech-priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for sure he was not at Eurac-V, so keep this in mind when making your future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for a Chief Enginseer. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of an oversight by an experienced tech-priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for sure he was not at Eurac-V, so keep this in mind when making your future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for a Chief Enginseer. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for sure he was not at Eurac V, so keep this in mind when making any future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for a Chief Enginseer. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for sure he was not at Eurac V, so keep this in mind when making any future plans."

"With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for sure he was not at Eurac V, so keep this in mind when making any future plans."

languages.text: « Si je puis me permettre, j'aimerais vous rappeler que nous sommes toujours en quête d'un technaugure primus. Le vaisseau et les esprits de ses machines ont plus que jamais besoin d'être placés sous la supervision d'un technoprêtre expérimenté. De plus, il nous manque encore plusieurs membres d'équipage... mais il y a plus important : nous n'avons pas localisé Heinrix van Calox, le bras droit du seigneur inquisiteur. Nous savons désormais avec certitude qu'il ne se trouvait pas sur Eurac-V, ce qui devrait vous aider dans vos recherches futures. »
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: « Si je puis me permettre, j'aimerais vous rappeler que nous sommes toujours en quête d'un technaugure primus. Le vaisseau et les esprits de ses machines ont plus que jamais besoin d'être placés sous la supervision d'un technoprêtre expérimenté. De plus, il nous manque encore plusieurs membres d'équipage... mais il y a plus important : nous n'avons pas localisé Heinrix van Calox, le bras droit du seigneur inquisiteur. Nous savons désormais avec certitude qu'il ne se trouvait pas sur Eurac-V, ce qui devrait vous aider dans vos recherches futures. »

languages.text: "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis möchte ich Euch auch daran erinnern, dass wir noch immer einen leitenden Maschinenseher suchen. Sowohl das Schiff als auch seine Maschinengeister sind dringend auf die Aufsicht eines erfahrenen Techpriesters angewiesen. Uns fehlen zudem einige Crewmitglieder, und vor allem haben wir Heinrix van Calox noch nicht aufgespürt, die rechte Hand des Großinquisitors. Wir wissen inzwischen mit Sicherheit, dass er nicht auf Eurac V war. Daran sollten wir bei unseren Planungen denken."
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: "Mit Eurer Erlaubnis möchte ich Euch auch daran erinnern, dass wir noch immer einen leitenden Maschinenseher suchen. Sowohl das Schiff als auch seine Maschinengeister sind dringend auf die Aufsicht eines erfahrenen Techpriesters angewiesen. Uns fehlen zudem einige Crewmitglieder, und vor allem haben wir Heinrix van Calox noch nicht aufgespürt, die rechte Hand des Großinquisitors. Wir wissen inzwischen mit Sicherheit, dass er nicht auf Eurac V war. Daran sollten wir bei unseren Planungen denken."

"Mit Eurer Erlaubnis möchte ich Euch auch daran erinnern, dass wir noch immer einen leitenden Maschinenseher suchen. Sowohl das Schiff als auch seine Maschinengeister sind dringend auf die Aufsicht eines erfahrenen Techpriesters angewiesen. Uns fehlen zudem einige Crewmitglieder, und vor allem haben wir Heinrix van Calox noch nicht aufgespürt, die rechte Hand des Großinquisitors. Wir wissen nun mit Sicherheit, dass er nicht auf Eurac V war, bedenkt das also, wenn Ihr über Eure nächsten Schritte entscheidet."

languages.text: «Con su permiso, también querría recordarle que seguimos necesitando un visioingeniero primero. Es de suma importancia que tanto la nave como los espíritus máquina sean supervisados por un tecnosacerdote con experiencia en la materia. También necesitamos algunos tripulantes, y, lo que es más importante, todavía no hemos localizado a Heinrix van Calox, la mano derecha del Lord Inquisidor. Ahora que hemos confirmado que no está en Eurac V, deberíamos tenerlo en cuenta al elaborar planes futuros».
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: «Con su permiso, también querría recordarle que seguimos necesitando un visioingeniero primero. Es de suma importancia que tanto la nave como los espíritus máquina sean supervisados por un tecnosacerdote con experiencia en la materia. También necesitamos algunos tripulantes, y, lo que es más importante, todavía no hemos localizado a Heinrix van Calox, la mano derecha del Lord Inquisidor. Ahora que hemos confirmado que no está en Eurac V, deberíamos tenerlo en cuenta al elaborar planes futuros».

languages.text: “如果您允许，我还想提醒您，我们仍在寻找一名首席引擎先知。这艘船与它的机魂都急需一位经验丰富的技术神甫来监督。我们还缺少部分船员，更重要的是，我们还没有找到大审判官的得力助手海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯。现在我们可以确定，他并不在欧拉克五号星站上。未来在制定计划时，请务必牢记这一点。”
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: “如果您允许，我还想提醒您，我们仍在寻找一名首席引擎先知。这艘船与它的机魂都急需一位经验丰富的技术神甫来监督。我们还缺少部分船员，更重要的是，我们还没有找到大审判官的得力助手海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯。现在我们可以确定，他并不在欧拉克五号星站上。未来在制定计划时，请务必牢记这一点。”
“如果您允许，我还想提醒您，我们仍在寻找一名首席引擎先知。这艘船与它的机魂都急需一位经验丰富的技术神甫来监督。我们还缺少部分船员，更重要的是，我们还没有找到大审判官的得力助手海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯。现在我们可以确定，他并不在欧拉克五号星站上。未来在制定计划时，请务必牢记这一点。”

languages.text: 「よろしければ、まだ機関整備師主任を探している事を改めて言及させてください。船も船の機械精霊も、何としても経験豊富な技術司祭に管理してもらわなければなりません。また、クルーが数名不足していて 、さらに重要な件は、ロード・インクィジターの右腕であるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスがまだ見つかっていないということです。ユーラック・Vにいないことは確実なので、今後の計画を立てる際はこの事を念頭に置いてください」
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしければ、まだ機関整備師主任を探している事を改めて言及させてください。船も船の機械精霊も、何としても経験豊富な技術司祭に管理してもらわなければなりません。また、クルーが数名不足していて 、さらに重要な件は、ロード・インクィジターの右腕であるハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスがまだ見つかっていないということです。ユーラック・Vにいないことは確実なので、今後の計画を立てる際はこの事を念頭に置いてください」

languages.text: "İzninizle size hâlen bir Başmühedyum aradığımızı anımsatmak isterim. Hem gemi hem de geminin makine ruhları, tecrübeli bir Tekno Rahip'in gözetimine büyük ihtiyaç duymakta. Ayrıca eksik tayfalarımız var ve çok daha önemlisi, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sağ kolu Heinrix van Calox'un yerini henüz tespit edemedik. Eurac V'te olmadığına şu an kesin olarak eminiz, dolayısıyla gelecek planlarınızı yaparken bunu da göz önünde bulundurmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "With your permission, I would also like to remind you that we are still looking for an Enginseer Prime. Both the vessel and its machine spirits are in desperate need of oversight by an experienced Tech-Priest. We are also missing some crew, and, much more importantly, we have not yet located Heinrix van Calox, the right hand of the Lord Inquisitor. Now we know for certain he was not at Eurac V, so we should keep this in mind when making any future plans."
